name: sanity-generator

scripts.dev: npx nodemon --ignore playground/generator-output/ --exec ts-node -- src/cli/main generate --config ./playground/sanity-generator.config.ts
scripts.dev:test: npx nodemon --ignore test/generator-output/ --exec ts-node -- src/cli/main generate --config ./test/ressources/generator-config-external-resolver-and-trim.ts
scripts.dev:sanity: yarn dev & cd playground && yarn dev

description: Sanity Generator is a codegen tool for [Sanity](https://www.sanity.io) to automatically generate GROQ queries from a schema perspective.
author: Niklas May <post@niklas-may.de>
